trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene le proprietà utilizzate per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> contiene le proprietà utilizzate per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito dal metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in base ai dati di rilevamento in un database utilizzato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Ogni elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> della raccolta di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituita da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> deve corrispondere a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro a cui sono associati dati di rilevamento nel database che soddisfa le condizioni specificate dalle proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella riportata di seguito sono illustrati i valori iniziali delle proprietà per un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Questi valori indicano che una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> deve restituire un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro che dispone di dati di rilevamento nel database.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Workflow Monitor.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [del flusso di lavoro monitoraggio esempio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Reimposta le proprietà dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> sui rispettivi valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella riportata di seguito sono illustrati i valori iniziali delle proprietà per un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: Questi valori indicano che una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> deve restituire un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro che dispone di dati di rilevamento nel database.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che specifica il limite massimo di tempo che, insieme a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, è utilizzato per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che specifica il limite massimo di tempo utilizzato per far corrispondere le istanze del flusso di lavoro con uno stato specificato da <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> applica un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a quelle istanze di flusso di lavoro il cui <xref:System.Type> è specificato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato è specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <xref:System.DateTime> specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> è inclusivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla modalità in cui viene trovata una corrispondenza per lo stato di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro, vedere la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se `WorkflowStatus` è impostato su null, `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` vengono ignorati.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro verranno restituite quando `GetWorkflows` viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMaxDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrata l'impostazione della proprietà StatusMaxDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Workflow Monitor.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [del flusso di lavoro monitoraggio esempio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that, together with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un elemento <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che, insieme a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />, è utilizzato per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che specifica il limite minimo di tempo utilizzato per far corrispondere le istanze del flusso di lavoro con uno stato specificato da <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> applica un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a quelle istanze di flusso di lavoro il cui <xref:System.Type> è specificato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato è specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <xref:System.DateTime> specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> è inclusivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla modalità in cui viene trovata una corrispondenza per lo stato di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro, vedere la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se `WorkflowStatus` è impostato su null, `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` vengono ignorati.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro verranno restituite quando `GetWorkflows` viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMinDateTime property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrata l'impostazione della proprietà StatusMinDateTime.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Workflow Monitor.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [del flusso di lavoro monitoraggio esempio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un elenco di valori per l'estrazione dei dati utilizzati per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.List`1" /> di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> contenente i valori specificati per i quali trovare una corrispondenza con i dati estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro o un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> applica un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a quelle istanze di flusso di lavoro il cui <xref:System.Type> è specificato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato è specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> possono contenere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> record contenenti i dati estratti dal flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> contiene oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> che specificano determinati valori per i dati estratti.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza del flusso di lavoro soddisfa gli altri criteri specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> non è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), i dati estratti archiviati nel database per un'istanza del flusso di lavoro devono corrispondere a uno o più valori dei dati estratti specificati dalla proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> per un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> che deve essere restituito per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), il set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito non sarà vincolato dai valori dei dati estratti per nessuna istanza del flusso di lavoro nel database.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> value that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> utilizzato per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> values or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> o null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è null (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> applica un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a quelle istanze di flusso di lavoro il cui <xref:System.Type> è specificato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato è specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> value specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro deve essere configurato per il valore <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> appropriato.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: È possibile trovare una corrispondenza solo per i valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> inviati nei record di rilevamento del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun record di rilevamento del flusso di lavoro è stato inviato per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro, si considera che l'istanza del flusso di lavoro abbia lo stato impostato su <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente viene descritta il mapping tra i valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> e i valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>.

trans-unit.source: TrackingWorkflowEvent value
trans-unit.target: Valore TrackingWorkflowEvent

trans-unit.source: WorkflowStatus value
trans-unit.target: Valore WorkflowStatus

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> è null (`Nothing`), il set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito non sarà vincolato dallo stato; in altre parole, un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> verrà restituito per tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro che corrispondono ai parametri specificati da altre proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the WorkflowStatus property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrata l'impostazione della proprietà WorkflowStatus.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Workflow Monitor.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [del flusso di lavoro monitoraggio esempio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is used to constrain the set of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects returned by a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <see cref="T:System.Type" /> di istanza del flusso di lavoro utilizzato per applicare un vincolo al set di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> restituito da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows(System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> applica un vincolo al set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito da una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a quelle istanze di flusso di lavoro il cui <xref:System.Type> è specificato mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, il cui stato è specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> durante il periodo specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e che dispongono di dati estratti corrispondenti ad almeno uno degli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specificati da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), il set di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> restituito non sarà vincolato dal <xref:System.Type> di flusso di lavoro; in altre parole, un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> verrà restituito per tutte le istanze del flusso di lavoro che corrispondono ai parametri specificati da altre proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
